name: Homegear::log
shortDescription: Writes a message to the script engine log file.
description: This method writes a message to the script engine log or error log file.

parameters.name: logLevel
parameters.description:
The log level of the message. If Homegear's log level value is lower than this value, no message is logged. Valid values are:
  • 1: Critical
  • 2: Error
  • 3: Warning
  • 4: Info
  • 5: Debug

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message to write to the log file. The date will be automatically prepended.
